resources.string: Brainwave literally means rapid fluctuations of voltage between parts of the cerebral cortex that are detectable with an electroencephalograph. Brainwave further also refers to an idea, a notion, an inspiration, a concept, a conviction or a model. This means to say that a Brainwave is a clever plan or notion.
Brainwave Educational & Counselling Services was started in the year 2011 to holistically cater to all those who were in need of resolving their emotional, behavioural and learning related concerns.

Brainwave is committed to meet the personal, academic and professional needs of an individual in an affable but proficient milieu. We take utmost care to maintain confidentiality. We are customer centered.

Brainwave is owned and managed by Ms. Jenil Jariwala, a Counselling Psychologist, R.E.B.T. Therapist & a Graphologist by profession. She has over 15 years of experience in the education sector.

She has acquired her post graduate Diploma in School Counselling and a Masters in Career & Developmental Counselling degrees from S.N.D.T. Women\'s University. She has also undertaken a foundation course on Education of Children with Learning Disabilities from Rehabilitation Council of India (RCI) as well as completed a basic and advanced course on Rational Emotive Behaviour Therapy and is now a trained R.E.B.T. Therapist for adults as well as children. She has also completed her basic and advanced course in Graphology.
In the course of her career, she has coached innumerable young minds and provided them the scaffolding and buoyancy to accomplish their optimum abilities.

She has been working with children, parents, teachers and adults across all education boards; NGOs; Child Guidance Clinic; Remedial Centre; Guidance & Counselling Department, S.N.D.T. Women\'s University, Churchgate; Distance Education Department, S.N.D.T. Women\'s University, Juhu. She also conducts one on one personal Counselling and Language Sessions for children, parents and adults to resolve academic, behavioral, emotional or career concerns.
"To build a healthy society" is our slogan. It appropriately reflects our attitude and approach when providing services for students, their parents and our education partners.

We seek to develop in every individual means to lead a happy and satisfying life, to empower people to sustain well in this dynamic and highly competitive world using their strengths constructively. A unique plan is chalked out for every individual who seeks our services as we strongly believe that every individual is unique and exceptional.
At Brainwave we facilitate an individual in the under mentioned ways:
\u2022 To assist you to cope better with your current environment and available resources.
\u2022 To learn healthy approaches to handle unpleasant circumstances and distresses.
\u2022 To make proactive choices to tackle challenging situations prudently.
\u2022 To empower you to cope better with toe-curling and acute instants.

\u2022 To help you chart your career path - For adolescents to discover your career options & set career goals & for Adults to make pertinent career alterations, to deal in a healthy way with mid life career crisis.
\u2022 To discover your latent potentials; to know your strengths & weaknesses & use them appositely.
\u2022 To help you make optimum utilization of your potentials.
\u2022 To help you develop vital skills for efficient and effective functioning.
\u2022 To help you manage transformations and adjust well in this dynamic world.
\u2022 To accomplish personal and professional success.
